snippet.title: Exist Archive Trailer 02
snippet.description:
Leave Your World Behind!
Aksys Games, tri-Ace and Spike Chunsoft proudly announce that Exist Archive: The Other Side of the Sky is available physically and digitally in North America for the PS4™ system and PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system! EU fans can get the game digitally! tri-Ace, architects of the JRPG series Star Ocean and Valkyrie Profile celebrate 20 years of RPG mastery with Exist Archive: The Other Side of the Sky! Prepare for an expansive RPG adventure that plunges the player into a mysterious realm beyond imagination! Brandish godlike powers in intense combo based battles with unspeakable horrors and vicious bosses! Traverse sprawling 2D dungeons as you scour the realm for loot, monsters and answers to the mysterious Underworld.
____________________

For more information about Exist Archive,
please visit the official website
http://aksysgames.com/existarchive
